featured.text: Many people who are troubled by skin rashes caused by bug bites use “foggers,” or “bug bombs,” to get rid of the annoying crawlers in their homes.
Most people who contract West Nile do not experience any symptoms at all, but, if they do, symptoms typically develop between 3 to 14 days after a mosquito bite.
Does it really ? (A) bite (B) type (C) work (D) use 2.

definition.zh_def: 咬，指用牙齒抓住或切割某物。
definition.en_def: To use the teeth to cut into something.
definition.example: The dog will bite if it feels threatened.
